title: Meet Ruth Holcomb, the Santa Cruz htSQD’s Newest Hitter
content:
The 21-year-old multi-discipline rider joins Keegan Swenson, Alexis Skarda, and Tobin Ortenblad and plans to race gravel and cross-country.

Read the full article at Meet Ruth Holcomb, the Santa Cruz htSQD’s Newest Hitter on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
